title: Luna-Sea
description: Strange things are happening at Beach Read Books, and not just within the pages.The doors to Delilah Duffy’s seaside bookstore are open, but will they stay that way? Still fighting to save her business and recover from her most recent crime-solving adventures, Delilah’s new start might have a quick end. A fancy party at the luxurious Peacock Inn should be a pleasant distraction. When the party takes an eerie turn, this amateur detective discovers another mystery - or so she thinks. No one believes her. With her nightmares, anxiety, and panic intensifying, she’s not sure, either. She searches for answers, determined to find the truth. With her island life at risk, is she becoming a lunatic or facing one?
author: Jessica Sherry
